document.full_text: lionel, one of two lions at the los angeles zoo for years, has died at the advanced age of 23, well beyond the life expectancy of lions in the wild and old even by comparison with some counterparts in captivity.
document.title: l.a. zoo's elderly lion, lionel, dies at 23
lines_and_colors: lionel, one of two lions at the los angeles zoo for years, has died at the advanced age of 23, well beyond the life expectancy of lions in the wild and old even by comparison with some counterparts in captivity.
